about_the_game:
NOW IT'S THE PREY'S TURN!


For a long time, the preys only ran away from their predators, but now they got weapons and will save their friends! In this platform game with super cute characters, your goal will be to complete SHORT ONE-SCREEN STAGES. Also you must be skilled to get diamonds and gold, which will be used to unlock stages and customize your character to make it EVEN CUTER!

EVERYONE CAN HAVE FUN!


The game has levels with very variable difficulty. Here is a lot of fun for those who are not used to this game style and just want to enjoy the fluid gameplay. And when you go forward, you'll find GREAT CHALLENGES for those who really like to show that know mastering the mechanics of a game! The controls are simple for you to learn the basics easily, but complex if you want to play perfectly.

CREATED ESPECIALLY FOR YOU!


A Pixel Art made with love, the game has a scenery made with care. Each character and personalization item has been drawn with calm and dedication to OVERFLOW PIXELATE CUTE on your screen. Everything here is well animated, for you to enjoy the adventure of these dear little animals!

JOIN THIS ADVENTURE!


Come help the preys, and join this adventure!

  • 200 STAGES to play, there's plenty for you to see.
  • PIXEL ART drawn with affection.
  • 10 SCENARIOS to pass during your journey.
  • EASY CONTROLS for beginners in plataform games, but complex to be mastered.
  • More than 100 ITEMS for you to customize your character.
  • 100% COMPATIBLE with Gamepad and Keyboard, and FULL CUSTOMIZABLE controls, play the way you want.

name: The Prey's Turn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6006U, 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10

short_description: The Prey's Turn is an action platform where you are a cute animal and need to save your friends from predators. Now, It's the PREY'S TURN!
